name: Valkyrian
obverse: Initials AAB inside a decorative shield surrounded by a wreath of roses.
reverse: Side view of the yacht Valkyrian sailing. Name of the ship is at the bottom inside of an oval with a sea shell at the base and surrounded by sea weed.
description: This medal was made for Axel August Bruman in 1906. It commemorates a yach called the Valykrian.
